    • HotelBookingSystem

      public HotelBookingSystem(int port, HashMap<Integer,String> hotelList)
      Constructs a new HotelBookingSystem with the specified port and a list of names.
      Parameters:
      port - the unique port of the HotelBookingSystem.
      hotelList - a HashMap containing the hotel names.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(int backlog)
      Starts the HotelBookingSystem with the specified backlog of the ServerSocket.
      Parameters:
      backlog - the maximum length of the queue of incoming connections.

    • handleRequest

      public void handleRequest(String booking)
      Handles the request to book or cancel a flight.
      Parameters:
      booking - String of with the format: "WhatAmI ProcessId Quantity".
